newsitem.title: CHINA: China mobile phone users rise to 5.89 mln end-Sept.
newsitem.headline: China mobile phone users rise to 5.89 mln end-Sept.

text.p: China had 5.89 million mobile phone users at the end of September and expects the figure to soar to 7.0 million by the end of the year, the China Daily said on Tuesday.
The number of cellular phone users increased by 2.265 million in the first nine months of 1996, the newspaper said, quoting the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications.
The booming southern province of Guangdong had the biggest number of mobile phone users, 398,589 in the January to September period, it said.
